name: Darts (itch) (campotech)
description:
A CLASSIC BAR GAME COMES TO X-STATION

Darts is a classic bar game where you must reduce your score from 501 to 0. This game brings the thrills and action of darts right to your X-Station. Use the mouse to click on the target and throw your darts to reduce your score to 0. Try throwing as little darts as you can to reduce your score to 0.

Use the mouse to play this game. To exit the game at anytime just right click.

The game also features jazz and blues music by Marc Seales such as

Highway Blues, Sunset Blues, Giant Steps and 4 more music.
